results.title: Metformin and Risks of Aortic Aneurysm and Aortic Dissection: A Mendelian Randomization Study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and Risks of @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@Aortic Aneurysm@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@Aortic Dissection@@@: A Mendelian Randomization Study.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Lin Z, Lin Y, Wu Q, Zhong G, Chen L. Metformin and Risks of Aortic Aneurysm and Aortic Dissection: A Mendelian Randomization Study. Rev Cardiovasc Med. 2025 Apr;26(4):27734. PMID: 40351677

results.title: Targeting autophagy in aortic aneurysm and dissection.
results.text_hl: For example, knocking out @GENE_ATG5 @GENE_9474 @@@autophagy related 5@@@ (@GENE_ATG5 @GENE_9474 @@@ATG5@@@) or @GENE_ATG7 @GENE_10533 @@@ATG7@@@ to inhibit autophagy and excessive autophagy activation can promote the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@AAD@@@. Recently, multiple studies have demonstrated that @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which are autophagy activators, can delay the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Dissection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000784 @@@AAD@@@.

citations.NLM: Fang ZM, Feng X, Chen Y, Luo H, Jiang DS, Yi X. Targeting autophagy in aortic aneurysm and dissection. Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 Sep;153():113547. PMID: 36076620
